title: Walking together; Talkin' business; Making things right (A)
creator_contributor_role: Council for Aboriginal Reconciliation, production company
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.
subject_group: Aboriginal Australia/Aboriginal Australians - Legal status, laws, etc.
Aboriginal Australia/Torres Strait Islanders - Land tenure
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Torres Strait Islanders
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Native title (Australia)
description: These three programs and a kit aim to support the Council of Aboriginal Reconciliation's vision for a united Australia "which respects this land of ours; values Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander heritage and provides justice and equity for all." 'Walking together' and 'Talkin' Business' highlights the aims and operation of the Council and 'Making things right' discusses the implications of the Mabo decision.
